roleset.name: to mark or cover with or as if with dots
roleset.note: DOT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dot' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from dot.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: The fish often are plentiful around the pilings of the old gas wells that [*T*-1] dot the flat surface like the remains of sunken ships .
example.arg: like the remains of sunken ships
